resources.string: It\'s a personal, decentralized, self-hosted and passwordless manager of secrets and passwords
To start using this app and saving your secrets you need to choose the unique name (Nickname). Just type it in the field upper.

You\'ve just created local data base. All your secrets and passwords will be stored ONLY on this device and no where else. But it\'s not safety. And one of the main purpose of Meta Secret is a data replication. We suggest to add additional devices to your own network, to be available to restore your data.
To add device into your own network you need just scan this QR code. Or you can left one Device. But don\'t forget: It\'s not SAFETY!

Let\'s add your first secret. After that, the app will encrypt it and split it on pices. Every device in your network will get a differente piece of splitted secret. To restore it, you will need to use at least 2 devices
